description: This file is a Flutter application's main entry point. It defines the main widget hierarchy, including a stateless widget for the app setup ('MyApp') and a stateful widget ('MyHomePage') that constructs a basic UI with an app bar, some centered text, and a progress indicator. The UI indicates that the application is in a generation state.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the dynamic content of MyHomePage.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; runs the Flutter app by instantiating MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
